data.title: biba singh: Latest News & Videos, Photos about biba singh
data.meta_description: biba singh Latest Breaking News, Pictures, Videos, and Special Reports from The Economic Times. biba singh  Blogs, Comments and Archive News on Economictimes.com
data.text:
Unleashing potential, embracing diversity: A symphony of women's voices

The ET Women Conclave 2024 gathered women leaders to discuss pressing issues, celebrate achievements, and promote leadership roles across industries. The event featured insightful sessions on work-life balance, gender-neutral leadership, and women's empowerment in various fields.

28 Mar, 2024, 03:28 PM IST

Watch out India, now Bharat has started to rise

In 2023 — three years of a global pandemic and waves upon waves of a deadly virus later — tier 2 and tier 3 cities are taking back the spotlight. According to an Economic Times survey, 30% of people surveyed in metropolitan areas want to move out of these cities.

12 Apr, 2023, 04:51 PM IST

Festive sales may overtake last year’s sales, say consumer brands, retailers

Consumer-facing companies see the biggest annual spike in demand during October-December. Even in the pandemic-hit last year, some recovery was recorded in the festive quarter with value sales growth of 7.3%, according to Nielsen data.

15 Sep, 2021, 10:13 AM IST

Retailers stare at losses as Delhi too downs shutters

According to Praveen Khandelwal, secretary-general of the Confederation of All India Traders, businesses stand to lose Rs 600 crore per day because of the closure. Malls in Delhi were already shut from mid-April and saw dwindling traffic even during those weeks when the shopping centres were open.

20 Apr, 2021, 06:58 AM IST

Demand for wedding fineries like lehengas to sherwanis give fillip to ethnic retailers

The onset of the Diwali season and the revival in weddings after months of inactivity are spreading some cheer among ethnic apparel sellers including Manyavar, Biba, W for Woman, Meena Bazaar among others.

03 Nov, 2020, 05:21 PM IST
